text: Ramona Theresia Hofmeister (born 28 March 1996) is a German snowboarder who competes internationally. She competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics, where she won a bronze medal in parallel giant slalom. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:German female snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Germany Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Germany Category:Olympic medalists in snowboarding
title: Ramona Theresia Hofmeister
